sourcesContent:
const CommentButton = ({ onClick, comments, color }) => {
    return(
        <button 
            onClick={onClick} 
            className={`flex flex-row gap-2 p-2 hover:bg-${color} 
                    [&_path]:stroke-400
                    hover:bg-opacity-10 [&:hover_path]:stroke-${color} 
                    transition duration-100 rounded-full 
                    text-sm text-stone-400`}
            >
            <svg className=' w-5 h-5' viewBox="0 0 24 24" fill="none">
                <g id="SVGRepo_bgCarrier" strokeWidth="0"/>
                <g id="SVGRepo_tracerCarrier" 
                    strokeLinecap="round" 
                    strokeLinejoin="round"
                    />
                <g id="SVGRepo_iconCarrier"> 
                <g clipPath="url(#clip0_429_11233)"> 
                    <path 
                        className="transition-colors duration-100" 
                        d="M12 21C16.9706 21 21 16.9706 21 12C21 7.02944 
                        16.9706 3 12 3C7.02944 3 3 7.02944 3 12C3 13.4876 
                        3.36093 14.891 4 16.1272L3 21L7.8728 20C9.10904 
                        20.6391 10.5124 21 12 21Z" 
                        stroke="#ffffff" 
                        strokeWidth="2" 
                        strokeLinecap="round" 
                        strokeLinejoin="round"/> 
                </g> 
                    <defs> 
                        <clipPath id="clip0_429_11233"> 
                            <rect width="24" height="24" fill="white"/> 
                        </clipPath> 
                    </defs> 
                </g>
            </svg>
            {comments.length > 0 ? comments.length : ''}
        </button>
    )
}

export default CommentButton;
